text:
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
134 6 CONNECTICUT AVENUE
WASHINGTON 36. I). C.
WILLIAM G. HARLEY
PRESIDENT
February 19, 19 65
Mr. Jack Crannel
Director of Broadcasting
Miami-Dade Junior College
11380 N. W. 27th Avenue
Miami, Florida 33167
Dear Jack:
Congratulations on your new appointment and best wishes for
your success there.
Harold will be writing you shortly about appropriate membership
for your college and what steps are necessary to acquire it.
I would be delighted to speak with you about the role of educational
radio in your operation and would, in fact, consider coming down
to talk with people in your administration if this seemed to be a
useful procedure. I shall also ask Jerry Sandler, who is heading
up our radio division, to send you some of his thoughts on this
matter.
As you know, many of the staff will be down for the instructional
television meeting in May and we will look forward to seeing you
then if not sooner.
Cordially yours
William G. Harley
WGH:mab
